page.title: 14SCHOOL FACILITIES
page.content: On Thursday night runs disco but on any other night there is nothing. Ballyoran School which is closing might be opening as a youth club which will be a very good thing because the young people are badly in need of one. I attend D.B.H.S which is a very good school. It has facilities which are second to none but I do not think these facilities are used enough. The teachers, in general, are very good. But I think some of them do not take a lot of interest in the pupils. There are too many pupils in one class so each pupil does not get enough attention. We have a swimming pool which is seldom used by the pupils of the school and we do not even have a sport's day which is a disgrace. Not many of the teachers seem interested in extra-curricular activities.
